meanings.definition: A type of hardboard made of wood fibers and resin.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used masonites to build the shelves in the workshop.
meanings.sent2: The masonites were perfect for creating a sturdy backing for the painting.
meanings.sent3: When the artist accidentally stepped on the masonites, they made a loud sound like a drum!
meanings.sent4: The masonites stood strong against the test of time, like a fortress protecting the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The masonites gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing their durability and beauty.

meanings.definition: A brand of hardboard used for construction purposes.
meanings.sent1: The contractor preferred using masonites for the flooring due to their reliability.
meanings.sent2: The masonites brand is known for its high-quality materials in the industry.
meanings.sent3: During the renovation, the workers joked about the magical powers of the masonites brand.
meanings.sent4: The masonites brand became the cornerstone of the construction project, holding everything together.
meanings.sent5: With masonites, the building process became smoother and more efficient.
